history.proof: intros P x y Hloc Hxy. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall x0 y0 : R, P x0 y0 \/ ~ P x0 y0) -> locally_2d P x y -> {d : posreal | forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < d -> Rabs (v - y) < d -> P u v}

Premises:
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_1d : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally_2d P (x + t * (u - x)) (y + t * (v - y))) x y
locally_2d_and : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v /\ Q u v) x y
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
locally_ex_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally_not' : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
continuous_neq_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> f x0 <> 0 -> exists eps : posreal, forall h : R, Rabs h < eps -> f (x0 + h) <> 0
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
Rbar_lt = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match y with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
decide_right : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), ~ C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : ~ C, P (right H)) -> P decide
Req_lt_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
Rmin_case : forall (r1 r2 : R) (P : R -> Type), P r1 -> P r2 -> P (Rmin r1 r2)
Rmax_case : forall (r1 r2 : R) (P : R -> Type), P r1 -> P r2 -> P (Rmax r1 r2)
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
Req_le_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) <= eps) -> x = y
decide_left : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : C, P (left H)) -> P decide
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2d ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> l1 <> 0 -> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]

```coq
intros P x y Hloc Hxy.
destruct (Hloc x y) as [d Hd].
exists d.
intros u v Hu Hv.
apply Hd; assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros P x y Hloc Hxy. destruct (Hloc x y) as [d Hd]. exists d. intros u v Hu Hv. apply Hd; auto.
